name: Kitty City Indoor Cat Cube Furniture, Gray Cube
short_description: 2-IN-1 CAT CUBE BED & LOUNGING PLATFORM – Enclosed lower cubby creates a private cat cave for hiding and resting, while the top platform serves as a cozy perch for lounging, window watching, and relaxing.
COMFORTABLE & PET-FRIENDLY DESIGN – Soft interior and top cushions provide a comfortable resting space for indoor cats or small pets who enjoy secure, enclosed environments.
FOLDABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE – This indoor cat cube assembles in minutes and folds flat for easy storage or travel, making it ideal for apartments, dorms, or multi-room use.
MACHINE WASHABLE CUSHIONS – Both the top pad and interior cushion are removable and machine washable, making cleanup quick and stress-free for pet parents.
STYLISH GREY DESIGN FOR ANY ROOM – Neutral grey color blends easily into home décor and looks great in living rooms, bedrooms, offices, or near windows.
product_description: Give your cat a cozy place to hide, rest, and relax with the Kitty City Indoor Cat Cube Furniture, a versatile 2-in-1 cat cave and lounging bed designed for everyday comfort and convenience. The enclosed bottom compartment offers a secure, private space where cats can curl up and feel safe, while the top platform doubles as a soft perch for napping, window watching, or simply lounging throughout the day. This dual-function design makes it ideal for cats who enjoy both hiding and elevated resting spots. Designed for indoor use, the cube is lightweight, portable, and easy to assemble, then folds flat when not in use—perfect for small spaces or travel. Both the interior cushion and top pad are removable and machine washable, helping keep your cat’s space clean and fresh with minimal effort. Finished with a neutral gray color exterior, this indoor cat cube complements a wide range of home styles while giving your cat a comfortable retreat of their own. With compact dimensions of 17.25” x 17.25” x 13”, the Kitty City Cat Cube fits easily in any room and provides a cozy solution for cats who love to lounge, hide, and unwind indoors.

name: SPOT Sleep Zone Cuddle Cave, Cat Cave Bed for Indoor Cats and Mini Dogs, Durable and Washable, Comfortable for Kittens and Puppies Under 10lbs and 12in Long, Tan Color
short_description: Our cat cave beds for indoor cats are cozy and great for cat hideaway or as a cat sleeping bag. Often recognized as cat owner must haves, our caves are durable and calming cozy pet beds for cats.
We highly recommend Sleep Zone Cuddle Cave as one of your cat accessories for indoor cats. The cave can also serve as an enclosed dog bed for miniature dogs under 10 lbs.
Cuddle caves are crafted with brown polyester fiber derived from recycled plastic bottles, a sustainable solution that reduces landfill waste and contributes positively to the environment.
Made with 100% recyclable material that does not shift or clump, our beds won't lose their shape and provide superior support and comfort to your pet. Machine washable and dryer friendly!
Cuddle caves are perfect for cats and miniature dogs who love to be surrounded by extra warmth and security. The soft plush interior will become an indoor cat house for your kitten or puppy!
product_description: Introducing our cozy cat cave beds, perfect hideaways for indoor cats and small dogs. Recognized as must-haves for pet owners, our durable Sleep Zone Cuddle Cave offers superior comfort with a filler made out of recycled plastic bottles. These eco-friendly beds maintain their shape, providing warmth and security for your pets. Suitable for cats and miniature dogs, machine washable, and dryer friendly, they're essential accessories for your furry friends! Ethical Products, Inc. was established in 1952. Our staff designs, sources, and develops products from around the world and focuses on sustainable, Earth-friendly products that are safe for your pets.
